bookAppointment.description: Book an appointment for a customer for a desired service

props.name: workspace_id
props.description: Select the workspace for the appointment

props.name: service_id
props.description: Select the service for which the appointment is booked

props.name: staff_id
props.description: Select the staff member (use this OR resource_id OR group_id)

props.name: resource_id
props.description: Select the resource (use this OR staff_id OR group_id)

props.name: group_id
props.description: The unique ID of the staff group for collective booking (use this OR staff_id OR resource_id)

props.name: from_time
props.description: The starting time for the appointment (format: mm-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss)

props.name: to_time
props.description: End time for resource booking (optional, format: dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm:ss)

props.name: timezone
props.description: The timezone for the appointment (optional)

props.name: customer_name
props.description: Name of the customer

props.name: customer_email
props.description: Email address of the customer

props.name: customer_phone
props.description: Phone number of the customer

props.name: notes
props.description: Additional information about the appointment (optional)

props.name: additional_fields
props.description: Additional customer details as JSON object (optional)

props.name: cost_paid
props.description: Amount paid for the booking (optional)

cancelAppointment.description: Update the status of a booking (cancel, complete, or mark as no-show)

props.name: from_time
props.description: The starting time for the appointment (format: mm-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss)

props.name: to_time
props.description: The ending time for the appointment (format: mm-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss)

fetchAvailability.description: Fetch availability of appointments across services

props.name: workspace_id
props.description: Select the workspace to fetch availability for

props.name: service_id
props.description: Select the service for which availability is to be fetched

props.name: staff_id
props.description: Select the staff member (use this OR group_id OR resource_id)

props.name: group_id
props.description: The unique ID of the staff group associated with the service (use this OR staff_id OR resource_id)

props.name: resource_id
props.description: Select the resource (use this OR staff_id OR group_id)

props.name: selected_date
props.description: The date on which services are checked for availability (format: mm-dd-yyyy)

getAppointmentDetails.description: Get details of an appointment using its booking ID

props.name: from_time
props.description: The start time of the appointment (in ISO 8601 format)

props.name: to_time
props.description: The end time of the appointment (in ISO 8601 format)

rescheduleAppointment.description: Reschedule an appointment to a different time or to a different staff

props.name: from_time
props.description: Start of the date range used to fetch existing bookings (to help you select the Booking ID to reschedule). Not sent to the reschedule API. Format: dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm:ss

props.name: to_time
props.description: End of the date range used to fetch existing bookings (optional). Not sent to the reschedule API. Format: dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm:ss

props.name: service_id
props.description: Select service to filter staff options

props.name: staff_id
props.description: Select the staff to reschedule to (use this OR group_id OR start_time)

props.name: group_id
props.description: The unique ID of the staff group to reschedule to (use this OR staff_id OR start_time)

props.name: start_time
props.description: The new time to reschedule the appointment to (format: dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm:ss, use this OR staff_id OR group_id)
